Name: Haunted Game
About the game: A super colorful and fun game where you have to escape from a universe full of monsters! Inspired by old console platform games like Super Mario and Sonic, in 'Haunted Game' the protagonists are Mateus and Ana, a young couple fascinated by the supernatural theme. They are trapped in a parallel universe, and you have to help them get back home! There are 15 levels full of enemies, traps and treasures, as well as scary bosses! Are you able to survive this adventure? - Select between two characters - Kill enemies by stepping on their heads, just like the old fashioned way! - Classic monsters like zombies, witches, ETs, werewolves and more! - Find the key that opens the door to finish the levels! - Find hidden pumpkins to access special levels and collect gold! - Buy lives and energy at the Cat Shop! - Several skins available for each character!
